title: The Light System - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/25/20
itunes:title: The Light System - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/25/20
description:
George Noory and Jason Shurka explore his work with The Light System, a group of highly advanced spiritual beings who have existed on Earth for thousands of years, and how the group explained the end of the Mayan Calendar in 2012 began an age of light on the planet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
